title: Does Tesla hire someone to deal with complaints on Twitter in Elon Mask?
subtitle: The list of jobs came after the electric car company dissolved the American press team.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: The list of posts published by Tesla in January 2021 described the specialized role that he had to address the escalations in social media... addressed to the Chief Executive Officer, who was Elon Mask at the time of writing this report.
